'''Oxonmoot 2022''', the 49th annual [[Oxonmoot]] hosted by [[The Tolkien Society]], took place [[1 September|1]]-[[4 September]] [[2022]]. As in the previous year, it was a hybrid event bringing together online delegates with those attending in person at St Ann's College, [[University of Oxford|Oxford]].

During the event, [[A Shadow of the Past|first]] [[Adrift|two]] episodes of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]] series were released on 1 September, which influenced the programme, with a watch party of the episodes and several panel discussions about the series.

Speakers included:<ref>{{webcite|website=Tolkien Society|articleurl=https://www.tolkiensociety.org/events/oxonmoot-2022/|articlename=Oxonmoot 2022|accessed=13 September 2022}}</ref>

* [[Marcel Aubron-Bülles]]
* [[John Garth]]
* [[Kristine Larsen]]
* [[Brian Sibley]]

Exhibiting artists included:<ref>{{webcite|website=Kunstmatrix|articleurl=https://artspaces.kunstmatrix.com/en/exhibition/10653071/catalog|articlename=Oxonmoot 2022 – selected works|accessed=13 September 2022}}</ref>

* [[Soni Alcorn-Hender]]
* [[Anke Eißmann]]
* [[Lída Holubová|Lída 'Aegeri' Holubová]]
* [[Jay Johnstone]]
* [[Ruth Lacon]]
* [[Ted Nasmith]]
